title: The AI Show: Ep 56 | Create a Custom Neural Voice "Lite" for Brands and Characters with Veritone
description:
Qinying Liao is here with Ashley Bailey from Veritone to introduce us to Custom Neural Voice "Lite", a new feature in public preview, which enables users to clone their voice by recording just 5 minutes of speech data. This new feature makes it extremely easy for customers, like Veritone, to create a synthetic voice that sounds natural before trying professional scenarios including audiobooks, language learning, reading news content and many more.
